TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IInheritanceService

Docs.summary: Provides methods for identifying the components of a component.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This interface provides methods that can be used to identify components of a component that are inherited from a base class.
To determine what components are inherited, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> method and pass the component to search and an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> to store references to the identified components. Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute%2A> method to retrieve an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> for a component that has been identified by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddInheritedComponents (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, System.ComponentModel.IContainer container);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddInheritedComponents(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, class System.ComponentModel.IContainer container) cil managed
Public Sub AddInheritedComponents (component As IComponent, container As IContainer)
abstract member AddInheritedComponents : System.ComponentModel.IComponent * System.ComponentModel.IContainer -> unit

Docs.param: The to search. Searching begins with this component.
Docs.summary: Searches the specified component for fields that implement the interface and adds each to the specified container, storing the inheritance level of each which can be retrieved using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method searches the specified component for any fields that implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>, adds each to the specified container, and stores an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> for each. The <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> for a component indicates whether the field is inherited from a base class and can be retrieved using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute GetInheritanceAttribute(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Function GetInheritanceAttribute (component As IComponent) As InheritanceAttribute

Docs.param: The for which to retrieve the inheritance attribute.
Docs.summary: Gets the inheritance attribute for the specified component.
Docs.returns: An instance of that describes the level of inheritance of the specified component.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the component has been profiled by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> method, this method returns the value <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute.NotInherited?displayProperty=nameWithType>. Otherwise, it returns the inheritance attribute for this component.
You should call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> on the specified component or a parent of the specified component before attempting to obtain an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that reflects the inheritance level of the specified component.
